creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: wide bowl that tapers toward basin and sits on a flared foot; interior is tan with celadon; dark glaze on lip and exterior of bowl; impressed decoration just under bowl that looks like impressions of sharks’ teeth; foot is an iridescent terra cotta color
medium: Stoneware, black tenmoku on exterior green ash interior
title: Bowl with foot (Tazza)
